title: LoL PBE Account
body: So I applied for the PBE about 2 1/2 years ago ish.  For 2 years and like 3 months I played League of Legends unpunished after I applied.  I was never accepted in those 2 years and 3 months and I am confused why I wasn't.  My other friends basically got instantly accepted.  Please help.

replies.body:
While we don't have set criteria for how we select for PBE access, tacticalpen23 touched on some factors that we've used in the past. In this instance, being patient and waiting for an invite is all that can truly be done at the moment. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

A lot of people apply so they have a lot to sort through.  They also like to pick people who are experienced in a champion and if they are about to rework that champion they will look at your stats and play time etc.  Just keep playing and see what happens.
